name: Square Wave
description:
Square Wave is an Arcade game inspired from the old classics.
Push Away the Squares before they pass through the arena.
Survive for as long as you can and Get The Highest Score.



Simple Game-play!

Control The Rectangle And move in 4 Directions
Hit The Bright Squares
Use Quick Reach Ability to get to your target faster





White Square!
Gain 1 Point when you score, Lose 1 Health If you Miss.




Healing Square!
Gain 2 Health when you Score, Lose Nothing when you Miss.




Death Square!!!
Gain 10 Points When you Score, Game Over When you Miss!






We Have 2 More Interesting Games Coming In the Future! Keep An Eye.
